title: Sydney .NET user group - July
sessionTitle: “C# Is The Future” & “No More Deadlocks” – Filip Ekberg
eventShortDescription:
“C# Is The Future” & “No More Deadlocks” – Filip Ekberg​​

C# Is The Future
The next version of C# is upon us so if you thought that this language was long forgotten by its creators come along on this journey where I'll prove you otherwise! 

We will look at how C# has evolved over the years and what we might expect in the future. Are you ready to embrace the programming language of the future?

No More Deadlocks
Do you find yourself in situations when your applications deadlock because of async and await? Do you want to make your applications more reliable?

In this session we will talk about how to do asynchronous programming properly in .NET. We will discover pitfalls and best practices which will help you along your way!

About the speaker:
Filip Ekberg is the author of C# Smorgasbord. Speaker. Pluralsight author. Microsoft .NET MVP. Xamarin MVP. Works for @Invoice2Go. Swede living in Sydney!​

​
